trans-unit.source: Defines an object that knows how to invoke a command.
trans-unit.target: Define un objeto que sabe cómo invocar un comando.

trans-unit.source: The command source defines how a command is invoked by that particular object.
trans-unit.target: El origen del comando define cómo se invoca un comando que el objeto determinado.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is associated with a command, the command is invoked when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, si un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> está asociado a un comando, el comando se invoca cuando el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> se hace clic en.

trans-unit.source: A command source will normally disable itself if the command it is associated with cannot execute on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: Un origen de comando normalmente se deshabilitará si no se puede ejecutar el comando que está asociado en el destino del comando actual.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Paste%2A> command will gray itself out when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Paste%2A> command cannot execute on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> asociados con el <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Paste%2A> comando se deshabilitará cuando el <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Paste%2A> comando no se puede ejecutar en el destino del comando actual.

trans-unit.source: Normally, a command source will listen to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event on the command.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, un origen de comando escuchará el <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> evento en el comando.

trans-unit.source: This informs the command source when conditions change on the command target, such as loss of keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Este modo, el origen del comando informa cuando las condiciones cambian en el destino del comando, como una pérdida de foco del teclado.

trans-unit.source: The command source can then query the command using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: El origen del comando, a continuación, puede consultar el comando mediante el <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Some of the classes in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] that implement <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> are: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>.
trans-unit.target: Algunas de las clases en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] que implementan <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> son: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, y <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>.

trans-unit.source: In the Windows Presentation Foundation commanding system, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> is only applicable when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: En el sistema, de comandos de Windows Presentation Foundation la <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> propiedad en un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> solo es aplicable cuando la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> es una <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> is set on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> and the corresponding command is not a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, the command target is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> se establece en un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> y el comando correspondiente no es un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, se omite el destino del comando.

trans-unit.source: Gets the command that will be executed when the command source is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el comando que se ejecutará cuando se invoque el origen del comando.

trans-unit.source: The command that will be executed when the command source is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Comando que se ejecutará cuando se invoque el origen del comando.

trans-unit.source: Represents a user defined data value that can be passed to the command when it is executed.
trans-unit.target: Representa un valor de datos definido por el usuario que se puede pasar al comando cuando se ejecuta.

trans-unit.source: The command specific data.
trans-unit.target: Datos específicos del comando.

trans-unit.source: Normally, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A> is used to pass specific information to the command when it is executed.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, el <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A> se utiliza para pasar información concreta al comando cuando se ejecuta.

trans-unit.source: The type of the data is defined by the command.
trans-unit.target: El tipo de los datos se define mediante el comando.

trans-unit.source: The object that the command is being executed on.
trans-unit.target: El objeto en el que se ejecuta el comando.

trans-unit.source: The object that the command is being executed on.
trans-unit.target: El objeto en el que se ejecuta el comando.

trans-unit.source: In the Windows Presentation Foundation commanding system, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> is only applicable when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: En el sistema, de comandos de Windows Presentation Foundation la <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> propiedad en un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> solo es aplicable cuando la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> es una <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> is set on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> and the corresponding command is not a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, the command target is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> se establece en un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> y el comando correspondiente no es un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, se omite el destino del comando.

trans-unit.source: When used with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, the command target is the object on which the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> events are raised.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se usa con un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, el destino del comando es el objeto en el que el <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> y <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> se generan eventos.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> property is not set, the element with keyboard focus will be used as the target.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> no está establecida la propiedad, el elemento tiene el foco de teclado se usará como el destino.
